alert.note: Alert for Phillips (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 1:20AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Phillips County through 200 AM CDT... At 120 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of Harlan County Dam to near Woodruff to near Prairie View. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Phillipsburg, Logan, Agra, Kirwin, Long Island, Prairie View, Glade and Speed. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until these storms pass.
